titleStmt.title: Apprentices no slaves An answer to a namelesse pamphlet lately published as an Act, declaring what habit apprentices are to wear. With an additional order forbidding their wearing of points, ribbons, and other trimmings whatsoever.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title p. 3; imprint from Wing.
Imperfect as filmed? Title page not filmed.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
